alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 11:12AM MST until December 26 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting in excess of 50 mph, particularly across exposed areas. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains South of I-80, Wasatch Mountains I- 80 North and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected, along with potential traction restrictions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains
